author: DistroTube
description:
'btop' or btop++ is a resource monitor that shows usage and stats for processor, memory, disks, network and processes. It's a much fancier than 'htop'.

REFERENCED:
► https://github.com/aristocratos/btop

title: Friendship With 'Htop' Ended, Now 'Btop' Is My System Monitor!
